item.title: Own, a new social media app, aims to tokenize the creator economy
item.description: Own is the latest alternative to TikTok to emerge in the market, featuring blockchain technology and a token economy.

item.title: Mastodon updates its terms to prohibit AI model training

item.title: Sword Health nabs $40M at $4B valuation, pushes IPO plans to at least 2028
item.description: The digital health startup says it secured the fresh capital to update its valuation and finance acquisitions.
